title: Throw it in! beef stew and dumplins
ingredients: ['4 carrots, chopped chunky', '2 large onions, quartered', '8 new potatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons frozen peas', '40g dried pearl barley (optional)', '450g (1lb) stewing beef, cut into chunks.', '1 teaspoon Marmite', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '35g gravy granules, or as needed', '50g suet', '100g self-raising flour', 'salt and pepper to taste']
